---
title: "compactsummary tables"
output: html_document
date: "2024-06-11"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
rm_compactsummary(data = pembrolizumab, xvars = c("change_ctdna_group", "l_size"))
rm_compactsummary(data=pembrolizumab, xvars = c("change_ctdna_group", "l_size"), iqr=TRUE)
rm_compactsummary(pembrolizumab, xvars = c("baseline_ctdna", "tmb", "cbr"), use_mean = c("tmb", "cbr"))
rm_compactsummary(data=pembrolizumab, xvars=c('age','pdl1','change_ctdna_group'), grp = 'sex')
rm_compactsummary(data=pembrolizumab, xvars=c('age','pdl1','change_ctdna_group'), grp = 'sex', show.tests=TRUE)
```
